The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 13 September is 3,177 (367.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 09 September, there were 158 new confirmed cases (18.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 September, there were 62 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 155% (96 extra cases).
